name: OpticalJam05
description:
FIXED, issue was redrawing the screen each frame, who knew that was a bad idea? so now its cut up a little bit, and its working, but you can see theres a bug where its running onto the other side of the colour map... Theres also another bug with the scoring system, its much harder to score than it used to be ;n;

SO this is a WIP for a game based on the below image, for the Optical Game jam 5

SO theres a couple of particle spawns, you pick up colours from there and mix them to try and get the target hue. 

I've left the downloadable file as record of what was submitted to the Jam, but its not playable.
